results.title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) managed NGINX ingress with the application routing add-on - Azure Kubernetes Service
results.description: Use the application routing add-on to securely access applications deployed on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

descriptions.content: OSS NGINX users have several options: Migrate to the Application Routing add-on with NGINX to benefit from official support through November 2026 while planning your long-term Gateway API migration.

results.title: nuget.config File Reference
results.description: NuGet.Config file reference including the config, bindingRedirects, packageRestore, solution, and packageSource sections.

descriptions.content: NuGet.Config file reference including the config, bindingRedirects, packageRestore, solution, and packageSource sections.

results.title: Configure multiple ingress controllers and NGINX ingress annotations with the application routing add-on for Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) - Azure Kubernetes Service
results.description: Understand the advanced configuration options that are supported with the application routing add-on with the NGINX ingress controller for Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

descriptions.content: Understand the advanced configuration options that are supported with the application routing add-on with the NGINX ingress controller for Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).
